property.name: bibQuery
property.value: WITH BIBS AS (SELECT BIB_ID FROM LMLDB.BIB_MASTER WHERE BIB_MASTER.SUPPRESS_IN_OPAC != 'Y' AND ((update_date IS NULL AND create_date > ?) OR update_date > ?) ), OLDBIBS AS (SELECT BIBS.BIB_ID FROM BIBS, LMLDB.BIB_TEXT WHERE BIBS.BIB_ID = BIB_TEXT.BIB_ID AND (END_PUB_DATE IS NULL OR TRANSLATE(END_PUB_DATE,'u#y| ','99999') < '1946') AND BEGIN_PUB_DATE IS NOT NULL AND TRANSLATE(BEGIN_PUB_DATE,'u#y| ','9999') < '1946' ) SELECT BIBS.BIB_ID FROM BIBS, LMLDB.BIB_INDEX WHERE BIBS.BIB_ID = BIB_INDEX.BIB_ID AND INDEX_CODE = '655H' AND ( NORMAL_HEADING = 'HISTORICAL WORKS' OR NORMAL_HEADING = 'CLASSICAL WORKS' OR NORMAL_HEADING LIKE 'RARE MATERIAL%' OR NORMAL_HEADING = 'OBJECTS' OR NORMAL_HEADING LIKE '%BIOGRAP%' OR NORMAL_HEADING LIKE '%PORTRAIT%' OR NORMAL_HEADING = 'STANFORD RELATED' OR NORMAL_HEADING = 'ARCHIVAL MATERIALS' OR NORMAL_HEADING = 'INCUNABLULA' OR NORMAL_HEADING = 'MANUSCRIPTS HANDWRITTEN' ) UNION SELECT OLDBIBS.BIB_ID FROM OLDBIBS, LMLDB.BIB_INDEX WHERE OLDBIBS.BIB_ID = BIB_INDEX.BIB_ID AND INDEX_CODE = '655H' AND ( NORMAL_HEADING = 'OBITUARIES' OR NORMAL_HEADING = 'FESTSCHRIFT' OR NORMAL_HEADING LIKE 'MANUSCRIPT%' OR NORMAL_HEADING = 'DISSERTATIONS ACADEMIC' OR NORMAL_HEADING = 'VISUAL MATERIALS' OR NORMAL_HEADING = 'SERIALS' OR NORMAL_HEADING = 'BOOKS' OR NORMAL_HEADING = 'PAMPHLETS' OR NORMAL_HEADING = 'LEAFLETS' OR NORMAL_HEADING = 'ARTICLES' OR NORMAL_HEADING = 'CHAPTERS' )
